tool_description: Evaluates project and organization details against specific grant eligibility requirements to determine qualification status and identify potential issues.

grant_id.description: Unique identifier of the grant opportunity to check eligibility for

organization_type.description: Type of applying organization (nonprofit, academic, government, for-profit, individual)

organization_size.description: Organization size category (small, medium, large, individual)

years_established.description: Number of years the organization has been established

geographic_location.description: Primary geographic location or state where organization is based

project_focus_areas.description: Main focus areas or research domains of the proposed project

previous_grants.description: Whether organization has received grants from this funder before

error_messages: Grant not found: The specified grant_id does not exist in the database.
Invalid organization type: Must be one of 'nonprofit', 'academic', 'government', 'for-profit', 'individual'.
Invalid organization size: Must be one of 'small', 'medium', 'large', 'individual'.
Missing required eligibility data: Grant requirements could not be retrieved for comparison.
Invalid budget or years values: annual_budget and years_established must be positive integers if provided.
usage: Provide grant_id, organization_type, organization_size, geographic_location, and project_focus_areas. Optionally include annual_budget, years_established, and previous_grants status. The tool returns detailed eligibility assessment.

eligible.description: Whether the organization/project meets basic eligibility requirements

eligibility_score.description: Numerical score from 0-100 indicating degree of eligibility match

met_requirements.description: List of eligibility requirements that are satisfied

unmet_requirements.description: List of eligibility requirements that are not satisfied

recommendations.description: Suggestions for addressing eligibility gaps or strengthening application
